segment.source: The encrypted drive recovery features of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) ensure the capture and storage of data and availability of tools required to access a BitLocker-protected volume when BitLocker goes into recovery mode.
segment.target: The encrypted drive recovery features of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) ensure the capture and storage of data and availability of tools required to access a BitLocker-protected volume when BitLocker goes into recovery mode.

segment.source: A BitLocker-protected volume goes into recovery mode when a PIN or password is lost or forgotten, or when the Trusted Module Platform (TPM) chip detects changes to the BIOS or startup files of a computer.
segment.target: A BitLocker-protected volume goes into recovery mode when a PIN or password is lost or forgotten, or when the Trusted Module Platform (TPM) chip detects changes to the BIOS or startup files of a computer.

segment.source: Use this procedure to access the centralized key recovery data system, which can provide a recovery password if a recovery password ID and associated user identifier are supplied.
segment.target: Use this procedure to access the centralized key recovery data system, which can provide a recovery password if a recovery password ID and associated user identifier are supplied.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring uses single-use recovery keys that expire upon use.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring uses single-use recovery keys that expire upon use.

segment.source: The single use of a recovery password is automatically applied to operating system drives and fixed drives.
segment.target: The single use of a recovery password is automatically applied to operating system drives and fixed drives.

segment.source: On removable drives, it is applied when the drive is removed and then re-inserted and unlocked on a computer that has Group Policy settings activated to manage removable drives.
segment.target: On removable drives, it is applied when the drive is removed and then re-inserted and unlocked on a computer that has Group Policy settings activated to manage removable drives.

segment.source: To recover a drive in recovery mode
segment.target: To recover a drive in recovery mode

segment.source: Open a web browser and navigate to the Administration and Monitoring website.
segment.target: Open a web browser and navigate to the Administration and Monitoring website.

segment.source: In the navigation pane, click Drive Recovery.
segment.target: In the navigation pane, click Drive Recovery.

segment.source: The “Recover access to an encrypted drive” webpage opens.
segment.target: The “Recover access to an encrypted drive” webpage opens.

segment.source: Enter the Windows Logon domain and user name of the user to view recovery information and the first eight digits of the recovery key ID to receive a list of possible matching recovery keys or the entire recovery key ID to receive the exact recovery key.
segment.target: Enter the Windows Logon domain and user name of the user to view recovery information and the first eight digits of the recovery key ID to receive a list of possible matching recovery keys or the entire recovery key ID to receive the exact recovery key.

segment.source: Select one of the predefined options from the Reason for Drive Unlock list, and then click Submit.
segment.target: Select one of the predefined options from the Reason for Drive Unlock list, and then click Submit.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you are an MBAM Advanced Helpdesk user, the user domain and user ID entries are not required.
segment.target: If you are an MBAM Advanced Helpdesk user, the user domain and user ID entries are not required.

segment.source: MBAM returns the following:
segment.target: MBAM returns the following:

segment.source: An error message if no matching recovery password is found
segment.target: An error message if no matching recovery password is found

segment.source: Multiple possible matches if the user has multiple matching recovery passwords
segment.target: Multiple possible matches if the user has multiple matching recovery passwords

segment.source: The recovery password and recovery package for the submitted user
segment.target: The recovery password and recovery package for the submitted user

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you are recovering a damaged drive, the recovery package option provides BitLocker with critical information that it needs to recover the drive.
segment.target: If you are recovering a damaged drive, the recovery package option provides BitLocker with critical information that it needs to recover the drive.

segment.source: After the recovery password and recovery package are retrieved, the recovery password is displayed.
segment.target: After the recovery password and recovery package are retrieved, the recovery password is displayed.

segment.source: To copy the password, click Copy Key, and then paste the recovery password into an email message.
segment.target: To copy the password, click Copy Key, and then paste the recovery password into an email message.

segment.source: Alternatively, click Save to save the recovery password to a file.
segment.target: Alternatively, click Save to save the recovery password to a file.

segment.source: When the user types the recovery password into the system or uses the recovery package, the drive is unlocked.
segment.target: When the user types the recovery password into the system or uses the recovery package, the drive is unlocked.
